title: An_Agorist_Primer_by_SEK3.pdf
description:
In this book, the anarchist Sam Konkin explains his philosophy of agorism and how people can apply the practice of counter-economics to their lives to liberate themselves and others from statist tyranny.

It is new peaceful revolutionary approach in which revolution is not to be done by the power of the weapons, but by the power of pure economic power.
